document: STRUCTURE-PROPERTY RELATIONSHIPS OF ELECTRON BEAM IRRADIATED MONOMERIC AND POLYMERIC SYSTEMS by Ha Chul Kim Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Chemical Engineering APPROVED: Garth L.
